title: Klarna boss claims AI halved workforce without layoffs

title: Himachal govt plans to establish Cyber City at Waknaghat
description: He said that the proposed Cyber City will serve as a hub for data storage, artificial intelligence (AI), and other IT-based enterprises, giving a major boost to the state’s digital economy and employment generation.
content:
The Himachal Pradesh government is planning to establish a Cyber City over 650 bighas of land at Waknaghat in Solan district.
Chief Minister Thakur Sukhvinder Singh Sukhu announced this while chairing a high-level meeting of the Digital Technologies ... [1842 chars]

title: Companies Overpaying for AI Add to Bubble Risks, Survey Shows
description: There’s growing doubt that firms are getting what they pay for when it comes to artificial intelligence, the latest Markets Pulse survey showed. That’s adding to concerns the $16 trillion rally from the brink of a bear market is nearing its breaking point.
content: There’s growing doubt that firms are getting what they pay for when it comes to artificial intelligence, the latest Markets Pulse survey showed. That’s adding to concerns the $16 trillion rally from the brink of a bear market is nearing its breaking ... [306 chars]

title: AI disruption reshaping jobs in India's USD 245 bn technology, CX sectors: NITI Aayog
description: Artificial intelligence is poised to disrupt India's tech and CX sectors, potentially displacing routine roles. However, Niti Aayog's roadmap highlights an opportunity to create up to 4 million new AI-first jobs in the next five years. A National AI Talent Mission is proposed to foster AI literacy, reskill professionals, and attract global talent, positioning India as an AI workforce capital.
content:

title: India's AI Revolution: Transforming the Workforce
description: Niti Aayog reports that artificial intelligence is reshaping jobs in India's tech and CX sectors. The threat of job displacements by 2031 looms, but with the right strategy, India could gain 4 million new jobs. A National AI Talent Mission is recommended to lead the transformation.

title: AI To Control Traffic Congestion In Rajasthan's Udaipur
description: Udaipur has taken a decisive step towards easing its traffic woes -- Artificial Intelligence (AI) will now manage traffic signals at the citys busy Fatehpura intersection, officials said.

description: PETALING JAYA: Small and medium enterprises (SMEs) will receive a 50% tax deduction to have training under artificial intelligence (AI) and cybersecurity under the Budget 2026, says Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim.
